unnormalised: ## Masala Chai and Spicy Scandal: Your Weekly Dose of Bollywood Bling!
normalised: ## Masala Chai and Spicy Scandal: Your Weekly Dose of Bollywood Bling!

unnormalised: Namaste, gossip lovers! Grab your chai (extra masala, please!) because this week's Bollywood buzz is hotter than a plate of Vijayawada biryani on a summer afternoon.
normalised: Namaste, gossip lovers! Grab your chai (extra masala, please!) because this week's Bollywood buzz is hotter than a plate of Vijayawada biryani on a summer afternoon.

unnormalised: First up, whispers are swirling around Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt. Spotted leaving designer Manish Malhotra’s house at 3 AM! Sources (reliable ones, obviously, the kind who know the watchman) say they looked… cozy. Is there a new movie collab brewing, or something more *dhamaakedar*? We’re keeping a close eye, people!
normalised: First up, whispers are swirling around Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt. Spotted leaving designer Manish Malhotra's house at three A M! Sources (reliable ones, obviously, the kind who know the watchman) say they looked… cozy. Is there a new movie collab brewing, or something more *dhamaakedar*? We're keeping a close eye, people!

unnormalised: Then there’s the case of Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas reportedly visiting Kerala. Rumours suggest they are exploring backwaters for a wellness retreat. But our spies swear they overheard a conversation about "Onam Sadhya catering" for a lavish party! Who’s on the guest list? Will Karan Johar spill the beans on Koffee with Karan? Stay tuned!
normalised: Then there's the case of Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas reportedly visiting Kerala. Rumours suggest they are exploring backwaters for a wellness retreat. But our spies swear they overheard a conversation about "Onam Sadhya catering" for a lavish party! Who's on the guest list? Will Karan Johar spill the beans on Koffee with Karan? Stay tuned!

unnormalised: And speaking of Karan, his alleged rift with bestie Kajol is back in the spotlight after she was noticeably absent from his daughter's birthday bash. Apparently, the drama started over a lost script and a misplaced samosa. Okay, maybe not the samosa. But a serious misunderstanding, for sure! We're sending them both boxes of mithai, hoping for a patch-up. After all, Bollywood without Kajol and Karan is like biryani without raita – just incomplete!

unnormalised: Finally, we hear that Ranveer Singh was spotted haggling for mangoes at Crawford Market. Yes, Ranveer Singh! Apparently, he's prepping a surprise "mango mania" themed party for Deepika’s birthday. Talk about a man who knows his wife!

unnormalised: That's all for this week, folks! Keep your eyes peeled, your ears open, and your chai cups full. Until next time, keep the gossip simmering! Bye bye!
